docs.snippet: The regular soldiers who have been stationed on Bedroe's Island during the last six months, were transferred to Governor's Island yesterday, as we stated they would be, some time ago. These are part of the Texan soldiers surrendered by TWIGGS, and...
docs.lead_paragraph: The regular soldiers who have been stationed on Bedroe's Island during the last six months, were transferred to Governor's Island yesterday, as we stated they would be, some time ago. These are part of the Texan soldiers surrendered by TWIGGS, and are now known as Company F, general service, and are commanded by Lieut. BROOME, of the Seventh infantry. They will be quartered in the garrison, Fort

headline.main: A PLEA FOR THE HEALTH BILL.
